palette.title: Oasis
palette.description:
I built this palette having in mind a beloved list of persons who I consider a sort of oasis of talented beauty. This palette is a personal gift for some persons that I feel I would enjoy drinking something and talking like crazies. But this palette is also this question: How is still possible you could build such beauty so easily? You have to be superinteresting for sure! You oddity you! ;-)
[Collective Gift] All of you! ;-)
